title: Existing slum structures on lands reserved for Rehabilitation & Resettlement shall be treated as sites for development of slum structures and shall be allowed for redevelopment according to this Regulation
clause_text: Existing slum structures on lands reserved for Rehabilitation & Resettlement shall be treated as sites for development of slum structures and shall be allowed for redevelopment according to this Regulation.
